message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of efficient access to data stored on a distributed storage system under security constraints, which suggests that it belongs to the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Cryptography and Security (cs.CR) sub-categories. The paper also discusses methods to balance the access load, which is related to Distributed Computing (cs.DC) and Distributed Systems (cs.DS) sub-categories. Finally, the paper establishes code constructions and existence results, which are related to Coding Theory (cs.CC) sub-category.
